skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in building dynamic user interfaces with React.js, Next.js, Angular, and styling with Tailwind CSS.

skills.title: Mobile
skills.description: Experienced in developing native iOS and Android applications, as well as cross-platform solutions using React Native & Flutter.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in server-side development using Node.js and managing databases like SQL/PostgreSQL and Firestore.

skills.title: Cloud & AI
skills.description: Familiar with GCP and Azure DevOps for cloud services and has experience integrating AI-LLM for text generation.
